reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Winters is very knowledgeable and passionate about biology. Her lectures are engaging, but sometimes the workload can be overwhelming.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Prof. Chen is an excellent instructor. His explanations are clear, and he's always willing to help during office hours.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's content is interesting, but her teaching style can be a bit dry. More interactive sessions would be beneficial.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Taylor makes complex math concepts accessible. His problem-solving approach is very helpful.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez brings history to life! Her lectures are captivating, and she encourages critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson seems knowledgeable, but his lectures are confusing. More structured notes would help.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Lee's passion for literature is contagious. Her feedback on essays is always constructive and helpful.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Brown's lectures cover important concepts, but he could provide more real-world examples to illustrate them.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Green is an inspiring educator. Her field trips and hands-on experiments make learning exciting and memorable.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Wright challenges students to think deeply. Discussions in his class are always thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Adams knows her subject well, but her pacing can be too fast at times. More practice problems would be helpful.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Prof. Kim's classes are eye-opening. He presents diverse perspectives and encourages respectful debates.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Torres has an encyclopedic knowledge of art. Her visual presentations greatly enhance the learning experience.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Clark's lectures can be biased at times. More balanced viewpoints would improve the course.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Nguyen is at the forefront of her field. Her integration of recent research into lessons is impressive.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Prof. Thompson's real-world experience in business adds great value to his teachings. Case studies are particularly useful.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. White's course content is interesting, but assignments can be unclear. Better communication would be appreciated.

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review: Prof. Lee's practical approach to engineering problems is excellent. Lab sessions are particularly informative.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Dr. Foster's enthusiasm for music is infectious. Her interactive teaching style makes complex theory accessible and fun.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Prof. Harris explains concepts well, but exams can be much harder than practice problems. More alignment would be helpful.
